dataset.title: A new West African genus of Bostrichidae (Coleoptera), and a key to the Afrotropical genera of tribe Xyloperthini

abstract.para: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Lan-Yu, Beaver, Roger A. (2023): A new West African genus of Bostrichidae (Coleoptera), and a key to the Afrotropical genera of tribe Xyloperthini. European Journal of Taxonomy 885 (1): 21-32, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2023.885.2185, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2023.885.2185

intellectualRights.para: To the extent possible under law, the publisher has waived all rights to these data and has dedicated them to the Public Domain (CC0 1.0). Users may copy, modify, distribute and use the work, including for commercial purposes, without restriction.

gbif.citation: Liu L, Beaver R A, felipe (2023). A new West African genus of Bostrichidae (Coleoptera), and a key to the Afrotropical genera of tribe Xyloperthini. Plazi.org taxonomic treatments database. Checklist dataset https://doi.org/10.15468/kw23c9 accessed via GBIF.org on 2023-08-28.

bibliography.citation: Liu, Lan-Yu, Beaver, Roger A. (2023): A new West African genus of Bostrichidae (Coleoptera), and a key to the Afrotropical genera of tribe Xyloperthini.
